author: Anonymous Poet
title: Guarding on the Midterm
question: I recognized that many of the solution files for practice MT-1 are not too particular with guarding on some conditionals. Is the autograder going to assess this, or will it be more of a focus on MT-2?
instructor_answer: For questions like this it would be helpful if you included the exact code you are asking about, or links or some other way for us to be sure exactly what you are asking about.
